titleInfo.title: South of Norden or Norden’s South? Germany and Baltic Political Space.
Neo-Nationalism or Regionalism? The Restructuring of Political Space Around the Baltic Rim.

bibliographicCitation.wels: Albert, M. (1997): South of Norden or Norden’s South? Germany and Baltic Political Space. In: Pertti Joenniemi (Hrsg.): Neo-Nationalism or Regionalism? The Restructuring of Political Space Around the Baltic Rim.. Stockholm: NordREFO. S. 85-118.
